Namespace osu.Framework.Graphics.Textures

Classes

ArrayPoolTextureUpload
DisposableTexture

A texture which can cleans up any resources held by the underlying INativeTexture on Dispose(bool).

LargeTextureStore

A texture store that bypasses atlasing and removes textures from memory after dereferenced by all consumers.

MemoryAllocatorTextureUpload
Texture
TextureAtlas
TextureLoaderStore

Handles the parsing of image data from standard image formats into TextureUploads ready for GPU consumption.

TextureRegion

A sub-region of a Texture.

TextureStore

Provides drawable-ready Textures sourced from any number of provided sources (via constructor parameter or AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload>)).

TextureTooLargeForGLException
TextureUpload

Low level class for queueing texture uploads to the GPU. Should be manually disposed if not queued for upload via SetData(ITextureUpload).

Interfaces

Provides drawable-ready Textures.
